name: Leg Press
instructions: Feet flat, back supported, full range.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull down to chest, control the weight on the way up.

name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down, curl legs up slowly and controlled.

name: Pec Deck
instructions: Sit upright, bring arms together in front of chest.

name: Seated Row
instructions: Sit upright, pull handle towards torso, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit upright, press handles overhead, don't arch back.

name: Hip Abduction
instructions: Sit with legs apart, push legs outward against resistance.
